body_html:
Happy to.

body:
Happy to.
`$ ldconfig -p | grep libcusolver          
	libcusolver.so.7.5 (libc6,x86-64) => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcusolver.so.7.5
	libcusolver.so (libc6,x86-64) => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcusolver.so
`
